title: PML-N leadership accorded rousing welcome in Paris by Pakistani community: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 23 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb said on Friday that Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz leadership was accorded rousing welcome by Pakistani community in Paris.
In a tweet, she said that on the roads of France capital, the song sung by Arif Lohar ” Mian Dey Naarrey” was echoing.
Referring to PML-N election symbol , she said Tiger was roaring in Paris, too.
